Build ID: I20070222-0951

Steps To Reproduce:
1.I'm running with the 3.3M5 install of eclipse.
   eclipse -perspective org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugPerspective
  dumps a stacktrace and exits.

Basic patch that covers the SWT exception


NOTE: This is not ready...it shows the Java perspective first, then switches to the Debug one. Not sure if this is a timing issue or not...
Kim, if you're up to it could you take a look ?
Eric: this looks okay to me.  I'm willing to bet it always showed the Java Perspective first though we should probably confirm.
I've committed the fix for this but wont ask for a rebuild of M6 to cover it alone.  If we resubmit it will be included in the build.
This will be going into M6 after all.
